meanings.definition: Causing an unpleasant feeling of fear or unease.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned house in the woods was the creepiest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie was the creepiest film I had watched.
meanings.sent3: The creepiest part was when the cat started talking in the movie!
meanings.sent4: The fog rolled in, making the forest look even creepier than usual.
meanings.sent5: The old cemetery at night was the creepiest sight I had ever beheld.

meanings.definition: Having a strange or eerie quality.
meanings.sent1: The antique doll had the creepiest expression on its face.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned amusement park had the creepiest atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: It was the creepiest thing to see a clown riding a unicycle backwards!
meanings.sent4: The old, creaky house had a creepier vibe than any other on the street.
meanings.sent5: The eerie music playing in the dark alley made it the creepiest spot in town.

meanings.definition: Moving slowly and quietly in a way that is unsettling.
meanings.sent1: The shadowy figure moved in the creepiest manner, sending shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The spider crawled in the creepiest way across the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: It was the creepiest sight to see a turtle sneaking up on a rabbit!
meanings.sent4: The fog crept in, creating the creepiest atmosphere in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The slow, deliberate footsteps in the dark hallway were the creepiest sound I had ever heard.
